sub_title: Field Epidemiologist | Public Health Specialist | Education Innovator | Trainer in Communicable Disease Control
summary:
Transmissible helps you design, develop and deliver great, engaging and effective training activities. 

After building a quarter of a century of experience in local, national and international public health, I saw the need for innovative approaches to training people in communicable disease control. With Transmissible - an enterprise that provides expertise in Capacity Building and Awareness Raising - I provide Training, Educational Games, E-learning, and Audiovisual Storytelling since 2016. For this, an extensive network of international experts and companies is available to join the projects that I coordinate. 

Feel free to contact me if you want to talk about turning your training materials from good into great.

treasury_media.title: Transmissible - Creative Public Health Support
treasury_media.description: Consultancy and project support for public health functions, epidemiology training courses and materials, capacity assessment, workshops, serious games, and video productions.

treasury_media.title: About Transmissible
treasury_media.description: T ransmissible.eu is an an initiative by Arnold Bosman, specialist in public health capacity building and training. Key Transmissible Products are Consultancy on Public Health Capacity Building, Training Activities & Materials and Video Productions. Through flexible partnerships within an international network of specialists, Transmissible creates ad hoc expert teams and even consortia to provide public health solutions.

awards.description: The master thesis "Legionella pneumophila and public swimming pools" received the award for best thesis by the Stichting voor Sociale Gezondheidszorg (SSG). The prize included 1200€ to be used for continuous professional development.

projects.title: Designing the WHO Flutool Plus Course
projects.description: As part of the Rosseta Consortium, this team created the online tutorial for countries to use the Flutool Plus of the World Health Organisation. This tool assists countries in creating a reliable costing of the Seasonal Influenza Vaccination Programme.

projects.title: Developing a Strategy for STI Prevention and Control
projects.description: At the request of ECDC, we studied requirements for designing a National Strategy for STI Prevention and Control. For this, we consulted with several experts from the ECDC Network. In a report, we outline the three main components for a successful strategy, which aligns national coordination, clinical services and public health activities. We suggest the development, implementation and monitoring of a national strategy and action plan along with seven steps from establishing a national coordination mechanism to developing a monitoring and evaluation plan for the strategy.

profile_positions.description:
At Transmissible, I provide European Public Health Consultancy for Capacity Buiding and Awareness Raising. Our services include Training, Educational Games, and Audiovisual Storytelling.
Transmissible is a Limited Liability Company with an international network connecting to consultants in public health, epidemiology, educational games and video productions.
profile_positions.title: Company Owner

profile_positions.description: the Rosseta Consortium was set up to create Resources to Support WHE Training, and consists of 6 creative companies and 57 international public health experts, covering 21 countries and 36 languages. The World Health Emergencies program (WHE) is part of the World Health Organisation, based in Geneva. Rosseta holds a long term agreement for supporting training activities of WHO.
profile_positions.title: Consortium Leader

profile_positions.description: As part of the International health Regulations (2005) Roster of Experts, I will be available from February 2017 - 2021 as Expert in Epidemiology and Surveillance. The Roster of Experts is a large list of international experts that the WHO may call upon at any time for advice and sharing experience.
profile_positions.title: IHR Roster of Experts, Expert in Epidemiology and Surveillance

profile_positions.description: The Digital Health Section appears in two journals: Frontiers in Public Health and Frontiers in ICT.
profile_positions.title: Associate Editor of Digital Health

profile_positions.description: At WHO signed a short term contract to develop a generic tool for country surveillance training assessments: needs, requirements and capacity.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.company: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC)
profile_positions.description: Leading a team of 27 internal staff and external consultants in Public Health Training, duties include supervision over the EPIET and EUPHEM fellowships, leading the E-learning development of ECDC Virtual Academy and introducing Continuous Professional Development Programme for European experts in communicable disease control.
profile_positions.title: Head of Section for Public Health Training

company.name: ECDC European Centre for Disease Control at Stockholm

profile_positions.company: ECDC European Centre for Disease Control at Stockholm
profile_positions.description: The European Scientific Conference on Applied Infectious Disease Epidemiology (ESCAIDE) grew out of the EPIET Scientific Seminar series. Currently the annual conference is more than a platform for FETP fellows to present their work. It is the forum for public health scientists to present and discuss evidence for communicable disease prevention and control.
profile_positions.title: ESCAIDE scientific committee member

volunteer_experiences.role: Board Member and Umpire at Baseball Club 'Houten Dragons'
volunteer_experiences.description: The Houten Dragons is a small sports club with several hundreds of members. For 3 years I have been board member and for 7 years I have been an active umpire in the competition.
